Description:
Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the trapping point between the punch and the bed of the Geka combination metalworking machine (serial no. 11205).

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate, having regard to the nature of your activities, for the effective planning, organisation, control, monitoring and review of the preventative and protective measures required to protect employees from the risk of using Excelfluid NP Soluble Cutting Fluid water-mix metalworking fluid.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that workers liable to be exposed to vibration at or above an exposure action value, and/or where the risk assessment indicates that employee health is at risk from their exposure to vibration, are under suitable health surveillance.
